name: Ambition: Strategy War Game
storyline: Hitler has taken France and is marching on Russia. Great Britain is preparing for coastal invasion. Japanese forces have sacked Pearl Harbor, and America now prepares for war. It is a time of great men, great machines, and even greater stakes. The future of the world hangs in the balance, and only the valor of many can withstand the ambition of one.
summary: This is a time for heroes. This is World War II. This is Ambition. Ambition gives you all the control, and allows you to focus on winning through intense strategic calculation. Don't be held back by generic rules or a lack of options - command your troops on three different maps using a mind-boggling amount of options and possible settings.
